content.content: Meet Your Delegate #22   960×540 525 KB  Welcome to the (announcement of the) twenty-second episode of Meet Your Delegate, where MKR holders and the broader community get to know their delegates. In this episode, we’ll have HKUST EPI Blockchain. Please review their delegate platform and prepare questions for the event  Format will be a brief (~10 min) presentation from the delegate followed by an open Question and Answer session.  Video Recording       Where & When    Zoom Video   Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...      Meeting ID: 899 8797 0712 Passcode: MYD22 Wednesday, December 14th at 17:30 UTC.   Add to your calendar!  @Recognized-Delegates
Despite the short notice, we hope that many will be able to attend. If you have questions and can’t attend the call, please message me and we will make sure that question is addressed!
